attributes.action: We the 52% want the Government to follow through with the EU result
attributes.additional_details:
Current petition to rerun the EU referendum which sits at 2 million signatures. The Lib Dems stating they are offering to rejoin the EU if elected. 

We need the government to be clear and resolute and tell this people of Britian that the vote stands and we are out.
attributes.background: Democracy needs to remain and the 52% who voted to leave should have our wishes honoured. There shall be no 2nd referendum, no back tracking and no confusion.
